Deals 22.5 (15 on illusions) damage in 0.5 second intervals, starting 0.5 second after the debuff is placed.
The damage of multiple Cloaks of Flames do not stack. Only the first applied debuff applies the effects.
abilities.description: Burns enemy units for damage per second. Illusions deal damage per second.
params: Attempts to damage if debuff was placed before spell immunity.
Illusions deal less damage with Burn around them. The main hero's Burn always takes priority, if an enemy is within range of both the hero and its illusion.

additionalInformation: Cloaks of Flames are fully shareable.
Stacks multiplicatively with other sources of magic resistance.
Increases all heroes' total magic resistance to 32.5%, assuming basic 25% magic resistance and no other sources of magic resistance.
